channel.title: [DELTA] Rerouteing EXP
channel.description:
Okay guys, I got a skill on my server "dungeoneering" and I would like to know how to make it where if you kill the dungeoneering NPC's they will give you dungeoneering EXP and not just attack, Defense, ETC.. I would appreciate assistance if you would be so kind. Please and thank you.
NVM, NpcHandler.java xD

item.title: [DELTA] Rerouteing EXP

I would appreciate assistance if you would be so kind.
Please and thank you.
